meanings.definition: An individual feature, fact, or item.
meanings.sent1: She carefully examined the tiny details of the painting.
meanings.sent2: The detective noticed all the important details of the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The cat's obsession with the smallest details of the toy mouse was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The artist's attention to detail in the painting was like a magnifying glass on a leaf.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the snowflake were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: To describe item by item; list.
meanings.sent1: He meticulously details each step of the recipe in his cooking show.
meanings.sent2: The historian details the events leading up to the war in his book.
meanings.sent3: The comedian humorously details the struggles of daily life in his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: She details her emotions like a painter adding layers of color to a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The teacher details the assignment requirements to ensure clarity for the students.
